review: It works great came very fast. But it synced my account and wont let me open Netflix
author: Genevieve

review: Love it!!  We use this daily now.  I may be able to get rid of cable now!
author: Dyan McDaries

review: I am still unsuccessful in connecting my WiFi with amazon......messages declaring non-connectivity are constantly displayed.....any suggestions?
author: Gary Deshields

review: Easy to hook up and use.. Like it very much and whole heartedly recommend it!
author: Louis

review: I'm still getting accustomed to it but so far so good. Just can't have an Oscar Watching party on the actual night of the Oscars, but I was able to watch only the clips I wanted to see the next day. We'll see how it works for me during football season, that should be a challenge!
author: Sharla Grayson

review: Has everything on it that I want. Only problem is you need strong wifi to use.
author: Carl L Denser

review: This thing blows the Chromecast out of the water in terms of usefulness.  I haven't checked out it's gaming chops yet, but for watching video the dual band wifi and included remote make the extra $5 well worth it.
author: macromorgan
